channel.title: SpringBoot on xdhuxc
channel.description: Recent content in SpringBoot on xdhuxc

item.title: SpringBoot 应用启动报错，Unregistering JMX-exposed beans on shutdown
item.description: 使用 Spring Boot 编写的Java 程序，其 pom.xml文件内容为： <parent> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId> <version>1.5.13.RELEASE</version> </parent> <dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-data-mongodb</artifactId> </dependency> </dependencies> 运行该程序时，报错如下： . ____ _ __ _ _ /\\ / ___'_ __ _ _(_)_ __ __ _ \ \ \ \ ( ( )\___ | '_ | '_| | '_ \/ _` | \ \ \ \ \\/ ___)| |_)| | | | | || (_| | ) ) ) ) ' |____| .
